::DrillBit::

The shot blasted his face, throwing him back, agains the ground, a few
feet away. The sudden movement allowed the missiles, and Deemos' shots
to miss. But the damage was heavy, he was lucky his head wasn't blown
off.
"Warning, system damaged. Predicon unit DrillBit, in stasis lock."
DrillBit's on board computer said.

OOC: DrillBit is near the Pred base opening. Someone please get him to a
CR tank.
